docs.snippet: Even before Sunday night's vicious presidential debate, Republican Donald Trump was losing ground in many of the states he needs to win to capture the presidency, according to the latest Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nation Project analysi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Even before Sunday night's vicious presidential debate, Republican Donald Trump was losing ground in many of the states he needs to win to capture the presidency, according to the latest Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nation Project analysis released on Monday.

headline.main: As of Last Week, Clinton's White House Chances 95 Percent: Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nation
headline.print_headline: As of Last Week, Clinton's White House Chances 95 Percent: Reuters/Ipsos States of the Nation

docs.snippet: In a story Oct. 10 about voter registration, The Associated Press reported erroneously that North Carolina has same-day registration on Election Day. The state has same-day registration during the early voting period, Oct. 20 through Nov. 5, but n...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Oct. 10 about voter registration, The Associated Press reported erroneously that North Carolina has same-day registration on Election Day. The state has same-day registration during the early voting period, Oct. 20 through Nov. 5, but not on Nov. 8, Election Day.

docs.snippet: While supporters of GOP nominee Donald Trump and Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton bicker following the second presidential debate, one participant is being greeted with almost universal approval: Kenneth Bone....
docs.lead_paragraph: While supporters of GOP nominee Donald Trump and Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton bicker following the second presidential debate, one participant is being greeted with almost universal approval: Kenneth Bone.

headline.main: Debate Questioner Kenneth Bone Becomes Internet Star
headline.print_headline: Debate Questioner Kenneth Bone Becomes Internet Star

docs.snippet: THE ISSUE: Radical Islamic militancy that has sustained itself for decades overseas has inspired a series of attacks on U.S. soil in the last year and a half....
docs.lead_paragraph: THE ISSUE: Radical Islamic militancy that has sustained itself for decades overseas has inspired a series of attacks on U.S. soil in the last year and a half.
